title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-3.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-3.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Subpart: (a) Base year means the school year prior to
the current year. (b) Current year
means the school year in which the plan prepared pursuant to the Subpart is to
be implemented. (c) Local funds
means monies raised by local tax levy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
149-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
